dataFeedElement.name: A genus and three species of Anthomyzidae newly recorded from China(Diptera)
dataFeedElement.description: The genus Stiphrosoma Czerny,1928 with S.humerale Rohá?ek&Barber,2005 and two species,Anthomyza elbergi Andersson,1976 and A.pallida(Zetterstedt,1838),are newly recorded from China.A key to all genera and species of the family in China is provided.

name.en: A genus and three species of Anthomyzidae newly recorded from China(Diptera)

description.en: The genus Stiphrosoma Czerny,1928 with S.humerale Rohá?ek&Barber,2005 and two species,Anthomyza elbergi Andersson,1976 and A.pallida(Zetterstedt,1838),are newly recorded from China.A key to all genera and species of the family in China is provided.

name: 动物分类学报 / Acta Zootaxonomica Sinica
